column1: #Text=Argentina thrash Serbia and Montenegro in Group C
#Text=Argentina thrashed Serbia and Montenegro 6-0 in a display that stunned the crowd in Gelsenkirchen , Friday .

#Text=On one side of this one-way game there was an embarrassment of Argentine talent ; on the other there was the humiliation of Ilija Petkovic 's side being out-played for 90 minutes by a team at the top of their form .
#Text=With the roof over the Veltins Arena
#Text=it was dark enough in the stadium for camera flashes to light up in the crowd .
#Text=On the pitch the Argentine players provided the flashes of brilliance .
#Text=An early goal after six minutes was the first of six goals that were the product of almost flawless team play and individual execution .
#Text=Argentina swept down the left , Maxi Rodriguez ran at speed into a pass and toe-poked first time beyond Dragoslav Jevric .
#Text=The next one was the climax of a 24 pass move .
#Text=Esteban Cambiasso tapped the ball forward to Hernan Crespo just inside the penalty area ; a back heal and Cambiasso ran on and smacked it past Jevric .
#Text=On 35 minutes the Argentina fans in the crowd seemed to know which way the game was going .
#Text=The chant " Ole " was heard as the Argentines continued to pass amongst themselves with great ease .
#Text=Totally dominant , the blue and white stripes had over 60 per cent ball possession come half-time .
#Text=Roberto Abbondanzieri in the Argentina goal was for the most part the spectator number 52'001 .
#Text=It could have been four nil at the break but on 36 minutes Crespo 's effort was judged to have come from an offside position .
#Text=Crespo got booked because he did not stop when the referee blew his whistle .
#Text=The television replay showed the linesman was mistaken .
#Text=Jevric could only palm a Javier Saviola shot to Maxi Rodriguez at the far post who stuck away his second off the post .
#Text=Savo Milosevic won his hundredth cap for Serbia and Montenegro , a statistic that included games with the Yugoslavia football team .
#Text=He forced a corner with a hard long range shot and failed to reach a header after Danijel Ljuboja had briefly stretched Argentina on the right .
#Text=On 64 minutes Mateja Kezman appeared to make a frustrated two-footed lunge which caught Javier Mascherano .
#Text=The referee reached for the red card and made a hard position harder for the unfortunate Serbia and Montenegro team .
#Text=Then it was the Lionel Messi show .
#Text=The Argentines were comfortable but had not scored in the second half until the 19-year-old Barcelona striker came on after 74 minutes .
#Text=Soon there were three more goals to the total .
#Text=Messi set up Crespo for a tap in ; he burst into the penalty area and a delivered a superb low pass across the goal that beat both the keeper and defenders .
#Text=Another young Argentine Carlos Tevez got past two half-hearted challenges from the Serbia and Montenegro defence and put the fifth around Jevric .
#Text=many Argentines in the crowd had waited for came two minutes from time .
#Text=Messi , recently back from injury , was fed on another burst into the penalty area .
#Text=He beat Jevric at his near post .
#Text=This year Montenegro made their split from Serbia official in the political arena .
#Text=In the Veltins Arena , Friday , the performance of the two national sides combined might be grounds for the coming football divorce .
#Text=The mathematics of the Group C table mean Jose Pekerman 's Argentina are not yet through to the knock-out stage of the Fifa World Cup .
#Text=They would go through if the Netherlands did not lose to Ivory Coast , who played Friday .
#Text=Pld W D L GF GA GD Argentina 6 220081+7 Netherlands 3 110010+1 Ivory Coast 0 100112-1 Serbia and Montenegro 0 200207-7
